name: Lockdown (meove)
description:
Malaysia is an era of destruction again surrounded by monster. In order to restore Malaysia, a vaccine needed to produce a chemical weapon to destroy every monster. Human are trapped in home and HQ; robot has to be sent to get the vaccine left at hidden lab.

Lockdown is a game made by group of students for the project. Still in development, but everyone is welcome to download and try out the game. Give us a good feedback. Thanks you
